channel.title: [PI] Help with Login Messages {Server Sided}
channel.description:
Problem]: 2 Problems With Login Messages [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/10r1yiu.jpg[/img] [MEDIA (TOP)]
Revision:317 loading 562 Client Type: [PI] InsidiaX Comments]: 1) How do i remove the Xp UNLOCKED/LOCKED message on login.? 2) [My Announcements File] [Announcements] announcement1= Greetings, TTeam Welcomes you to: TTRunescape!
Etra Comments]: I can't use the CTRL+F, because my laptop is messed up and i am on SAFE MODE which i can only search for (folders, java files, txt files, and class files.) Please just tell me what file it is on, i don't need to be spoonfed.

item.title: [PI] Help with Login Messages {Server Sided}
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

strucker:

advice, dont use anything ending in diax (including trisidiax insidiax and that.)

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Help with Login Messages {Server Sided}
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The double message is probably because you have the rights for the messages set so you receive it twice.
Example:
I have playerRights = 5;
and the code looks like this:

if(c.playerRights >= 1){
c.sendMessage("Hey everyone....");
}else if(c.playerRights == 5){
c.sendMessage("Hey everyone....");
}

bad conventions because it was wrote in the reply.

Read full topic
